net.marfgamer.jraknet.example.chat.client

Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.example.chat.client.ChatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RakNetClientListener

    public class ChatClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements RakNetClientListener
    A simple chat client built using JRakNet and a JFrame
    Author:
    MarfGamer
